name: rock-slide
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: Large boulders are hurled at the target to inflict damage.
